.. _apptainer_plugin_uninstall:

apptainer plugin uninstall
--------------------------

Uninstall removes the named plugin from the system

Synopsis
~~~~~~~~



  The 'plugin uninstall' command removes the named plugin from the system

::

  apptainer plugin uninstall <name>

Examples
~~~~~~~~

::


    $ apptainer plugin uninstall example.org/plugin

Options
~~~~~~~

::

  -h, --help   help for uninstall

SEE ALSO
~~~~~~~~

* :ref:`apptainer plugin <apptainer_plugin>` 	 - Manage Apptainer plugins

*Auto generated by spf13/cobra on 17-Oct-2022*
